column4: Can someone help me get my sound working? I have tried a lot of things but nothing seems to do it...and yes its not muted.

details
what kind of details?
details about your problem. Card manufacturer, system, drivers, credit card number, SSN and date of birth.
cs4231 is the sound card, system is a dell workstation 41 (ancient i know, its a server though), drivers..modprobe doesnt seem to do anything...credit card number 421HEY! :)
are your drivers installed? Can you manipulate volume?
alsamixer doesnt even start
I think it's easy
alsamixer: function snd_ctl_open failed for default: No such device | /dev/dsp doesnt exist
es? i have a cs4231 chipset
any other ideas? modprobe snd-cs4231 works but doesnt output anything (im guessing its working).
sudo modprobe snd-cs4231
nada :-/ I had sound working about a week ago...reboot then it stopped, I don't think I did anything aside from update webmin and give the box a .net hostname.
doing that doesnt give any feedback, just does it and puts me back to terminal on a new line.
same error
aplay -l says no soundcards found as well.
happy new year!!
lol dankies :D
